Monster Lair

*Classic Controller*

Weapons Select [Crapulecorp]
42000000 90000000
00B78D3D 0000000X
E0000000 80008000
*Replace X for :
1 Default Weapon
2 shuriken
3 Missile
4 Anneaux d'Energie
5 Double Tir
6 Laser
7 Tempete de Feu*
